title: Extraction, Phytochemical profile, and neuroprotective activity of Phyllanthus emblica fruit extract against sodium valproate-induced postnatal autism in BALB/c mice
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Balaji Gouda, Sukesh Narayan Sinha, Rajendra Sangaraju, Tien Huynh, Shashikala Patangay, Surekha Venkata Mullapudi, Sathish Kumar Mungamuri, Pradeep B. Patil, Madhusudhana Chary Periketi
